name: BadaBroom
description:
Try to control your magic broom to bring down your rivals! Made in 48 hours during the UQAC 2020 WonderJam, BadaBroom mixes the retro style of the first 3D games from the '90s with the gyroscopic controls of your smartphone.

This game was made by Totema Studio and  friends with a team of 6 in only 48 hours.

We made this game during the WonderJam 2020 at the University of Quebec at Chicoutimi.

At Totema Studio, we specialize in local multiplayer games. Here comes another one!

Join our Patreon if you are interested in more games!

Theme

  • When magic goes wrong

Styles

  • Arcade
  • Survival

Details

  • 2-4 players local multiplayer game (Splitscreen)
  • Use your mobile to control your broom's direction by changing your device orientation
  • Collect and use magic spells (fireballs for now) to knock the other magicians off their broom

Team

  • Maxime Boudreault
